main.name: Bingfei Zhang
main.description: I am a Master of Software Engineering student at the University of California, Irvine. I have both frontend and backend intern and project experiences. I am currently looking for full-time Software Development Engineer opportunities.
main.bio1: I am a curious person and I like learning new skills. I am a quick learner and I can learn new technologies in a short time. I have strong research skills and I am good at solving problems. I am familiar with the state of art software development tools including Java, JavaScript, Spring, React, and so on. My interest mainly falls on full-stack software development.
main.bio2: I am outgoing and I am a team player. I love basketball. I won the Department's Basketball Championship when I was in university. In my free time, I like doing outdoor sports. I like fishing, hiking, and snowboarding. Also, I like reading. History, sci-fi and detective fiction are my favourites.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.courses: Applied Data Structures and Algorithms • Network Programming • Database Programming • Software Testing and Debugging •  Distributed Software Architecture • Mobile Programming • Software Security and Dependability

education.degree: Master of Applied Science, Civil Engineering

work.title: Software Development Engineer Intern
description: Participated in the development of a virtual conference platform for academic conferences - CLOWDR. Used by the 2020 International Conference on Functional Programming, the 2020 International Conference on Software Engineering, etc.
Developed the administration tables with React.js and Ant Design, implemented sorting, searching and inline editing functions for the conference tracks, papers, etc.
Converted the project from JavaScript to TypeScript.

work.title: Web developer
description: Participated in the development of a website for a truck company.
Built a web page with BootStrap 4 and implemented functions including log in/sign up, package tracking with vue.js.
Developed the backend with Spring Boot and Spring Security, connect to the frontend with RESTful API calls.
Design database schemas including user profiles, shipping information, etc. for the project and stored data in MongoDB.

work.title: Research Intern
description: Developed an algorithm to locate construction equipment based on surveillance cameras with OpenCV and Python.
Implemented and tested deep learning algorithms on AWS to track and detect equipment on construction sites.
Researched algorithms for matching construction equipment in different camera views with OpenCV and Python.

projects.title: Vison-based fall detection system
projects.category: A deep learning fall detection method.

projects.title: National Park Guide
projects.category: An android app for national park information.

projects.title: Multi-camera Views Object Matching
projects.category: A combinatorial matching method for multi-camera views.
